entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
